DataElement.preferredName: Complication During Localization Technique Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to whether or not complications occurred during the localization technique.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure._At some point in a given period of time._The process of determining or marking the location or site of a lesion or disease. May also refer to the process of keeping a lesion or disease in a specific location or site._A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Complication; any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of (or because of) another disease.

Concepts.definition: Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The process of determining or marking the location or site of a lesion or disease. May also refer to the process of keeping a lesion or disease in a specific location or site.:A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The process of determining or marking the location or site of a lesion or disease.
A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
